column1: separate from the other areas as described. The position of the wife of the accused was that the
practice had been stopped by discussion by accused and his wife and in compliance with applicable
circulars. The wife of the accused admitted that there had been private medical assistance given
in  official  bungalows  of  doctors  in  the  past.  It  was  her  contention  that  in  hospitals  they  were
attached to in the past, the practice of giving medical services in the private bungalows, had led
to  their  child  contracting  pneumonia.  Therefore,  there  had  been  such  a  past  practice  even
